mapper.sql: BUSINESS_ID, RT_HOLIDAY, RT_TERM, RT_FIELD, RT_NUM, RT_NAME, RT_TEL, RT_OPEN, RT_CLOSE, RT_PICTURE, RT_ADDRESS, RT_CAPACITY, RT_DEPOSIT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO restaurant() VALUES (#{businessId}, #{rtHoliday}, #{rtTerm}, #{rtField}, #{rtNum}, #{rtName}, #{rtTel}, to_date(#{rtOpen}, 'hh24:mi'), to_date(#{rtClose},'hh24:mi'), #{rtPicture}, #{rtAddress}, #{rtCapacity}, #{rtDeposit})
mapper.select: select RESTAURANT.BUSINESS_ID, RESTAURANT.RT_HOLIDAY, RESTAURANT.RT_TERM, RESTAURANT.RT_FIELD, RESTAURANT.RT_NUM, RESTAURANT.RT_NAME, RESTAURANT.RT_TEL, RESTAURANT.RT_OPEN, RESTAURANT.RT_CLOSE, RESTAURANT.RT_PICTURE, RESTAURANT.RT_ADDRESS, RESTAURANT.RT_CAPACITY, RT_DEPOSIT, holiday.Holiday_Name, holiday.Holiday_VAL, term.Term_name, term.Term_VAL, field.field_name, field.field_VAL FROM RESTAURANT, holiday, field, term WHERE RESTAURANT.rt_holiday = holiday.holiday_name and RESTAURANT.rt_field = field.field_name and RESTAURANT.rt_term = term.term_name and RESTAURANT.business_id = #{businessId}
